info.title: Ringg AI API Documentation
info.description: This is the documentation for the Ringg AI APIs. The Ringg AI API follows RESTful principles, making it intuitive and easy to integrate with your applications. All API requests should be made to the base URL. The API accepts and returns data in JSON format. Ensure your requests include the appropriate Content-Type header for POST and PATCH requests.

tags.name: calling
tags.description: Endpoints for making and managing calls.

get.description: Retrieves information about your current workspace.

200.description: Successful Response: Information about the current workspace.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all users in your current workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of users in the workspace.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of available phone numbers in your workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of available phone numbers.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of saved contact CSV files.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of contact list metadata.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available assistants in your workspace.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return (default: 20, max: 100).

200.description: Successful Response: A list of assistants.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific assistant by its ID.

parameters.name: agent_id
parameters.description: (Required) ID of the assistant to retrieve.

200.description: Successful Response: Detailed information about the assistant.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

post.description: Starts a new individual outbound call to a specified recipient.

200.description: Successful Response: Details about the initiated call.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves the history of calls made through the Ringg AI platform.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Filter calls starting from this date (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Filter calls up to this date (ISO 8601 format).

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of calls to return (default: 10).

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: Whether to download the results as a CSV file.

parameters.name: bulk_list_id
parameters.description: Filter calls by bulk list ID.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid parameters or request format.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing API key.

500.description: Internal Server Error - Something went wrong on our end.

message.example: An unexpected error occurred on the server.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific call using its unique identifier.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: (Required) The unique identifier (UUID) of the call.

404.description: Not Found - The call does not exist.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all campaigns for the current user.

parameters.name: call_count
parameters.description: Whether to include call count for each campaign.

post.description: Initiates a new campaign with the specified configuration.
Uploads a contact list for a campaign. Accepts a CSV file and campaign configuration as form data.

variables_map.description: (Required) JSON string mapping variable names to columns.

file.description: (Required) CSV file containing the contact list.

200.description: Contact list uploaded and campaign saved successfully.

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid input or file.

patch.description: Terminates calls for a campaign, agent, or specific call IDs.

detail.example: Either 'agent_id' or 'call_ids' or 'campaign_id' must be provided.
